description: Persian [Term?] (“prince, great personage”). Regarding the sense of a scavenger, Yule & Burnell (see References) state that the term was "applied to the class in question in irony, or rather in consolation".

entries.meaning: (India, historical) A ruler in certain princely states of the Northwest Frontier region.
(India, historical) A sweeper or scavenger of low caste.
